data.\uace0\uac1d\ub2d8\uaed8\uc11c (\ube44\u: If you want to sell (Bitcoin Cash), you must first deposit it into your wallet or buy from another member.
data.\uace0\uac1d\ub2d8\uc5d0\uac8c \uc9c0\uc: When you send (Bitcoin Cash) to the (Bitcoin Cash) address specified for you, it is automatically reflected in your wallet.
data.\ud3c9\uc77c \uc624\uc804 10\uc2dc \uae4: Requests and confirmations by 10:00 am on weekdays: processing completed before 12:00 am on the same day.
data.\ud3c9\uc77c \uc624\ud6c4 4\uc2dc \uae4c: Requests and confirmations by 4 pm on weekdays: Processing completed before 6 pm on the same day.
data.\ubc95\uc815 \uacf5\ud734\uc77c\uc740 \u: Deposit and withdrawal services are not supported on statutory holidays.
data.\ud1a0,\uc77c \ubc0f \uacf5\ud734\uc77c: Deposits and withdrawals on Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays → On weekdays business days
data.\uc774\uc804\uc5d0 \uc785\uae08 \uc774\u: Even if you have previously made a deposit, you must go through the same deposit procedure each time.
data.\ud1b5\uc7a5\uc785\uae08\ub0b4\uc5ed\uac: If the bankbook deposit details and the deposit reservation details match exactly, it takes about 10 minutes after the deposit to be reflected in the customer's account.
data.\uc2e0\uccad \ud6c4 30\ubd84 \ub0b4 \ubb: If payment is not made within 30 minutes after application, the deposit application will be canceled after confirmation by the administrator.
data.\uc11c\ubc84 \uc810\uac80 \uc2dc\uac04 \: Deposit processing may be delayed than usual during server maintenance hours or at the end of the month when there is a lot of bank transaction processing.
data.\uc740\ud589 \uacf5\ud1b5 \uc810\uac80 \: Deposits may not be possible or may be delayed during common bank inspection hours (23:30 - 00:30 daily).
data.\ubc18\ub4dc\uc2dc \u2018\uc785\uae08\u2: You must deposit the amount requested in ‘Deposit’ from the account at once.
data.\ub2e4\uc74c\uc758 \uacbd\uc6b0\uc5d0\ub: Deposits will not be processed in the following cases.
data.\uc608\uc57d\ud55c \uae08\uc561\uacfc \u: Deposit an amount different from the reserved amount Example) Reserve KRW 1,000,000 and deposit KRW 100,000
data.\uc608\uc57d\ud55c \uae08\uc561\uc744 \u: Deposit by dividing the reserved amount Example) Deposit 1,000,000 KRW in two divided payments of 500,000 KRW
data.\uae08\uc561 \uc0c1\uc774\ub85c \uc778\u: In case of delay in deposit due to a difference in amount, you must submit evidence that can confirm whether or not the deposit has been made. (At this time, the evidence you submit must be data that can accurately confirm the name of the account holder, account number, deposit amount, and deposit time.)
data.\uc785\uae08\uc561\uc774 \uacc4\uc815\uc: If the deposit amount is not reflected in your account or is delayed, please contact the customer support center email at the bottom of the site.
data.(\ube44\ud2b8\ucf54\uc778\uce90\uc2dc) \: (Bitcoin Cash) can be transferred from the wallet of the exchange customer to the wallet of an external customer.
data.\uace0\uac1d\ub2d8\uc758 (\ube44\ud2b8\u: A transaction fee is included in (Bitcoin Cash) transactions to ensure that your (Bitcoin Cash) transactions are processed by the network. The actual deposit amount is the amount minus the exchange fee and the transaction fee.
